item.description:
location: 131 Amory St. Manchester NH

doors open at 10.Â  get there early for a seat.

11:00 - 11:30
Greg Hartmann, Mapping and Identifying the Cultural Stages of a Group or Organization
Greg is a Founding Partner and President of Cultural Architecture, Inc.
Cultural Architecture is an education oriented consulting firm focusing on leadership, strategy and cultural change issues, and the training and development of key executives.

11:30 - 12:00
Christopher David, Open Sourcing Politics
Christopher David, aka Free Stater #673, is an entrepreneur and political consultant specializing in telecommunications. In 2009 Chris moved to Deerfield and then to Manchester, NH, where he lived for over a year. Despite moving to Los Angeles to start a business and run for Congress against Henry Waxman in 2012, he still remains active in the Free Stater community as a "political arms dealer".
Chris will discuss recent developments in political technology and how leveraging the latest trends can empower activists to challenge entrenched power.

12:00 - 12:30
* Marcus Thomas, Adopt Your Block
* Announcements

And the sweetest part - ice cream by Amanda!
item.name: Manchester Liberty Meetup
